lyrics.text:
’Oku ‘iate au,
‘A e fekau ke fai,
Ke tauhi hoku ‘Otua,
‘I he loto tui.

Pea u fakahaofi,
Hoku laumālie,
Pea u kumi teunga ki ai,
Ki he maama lelei.

Pea u tauhi foki,
‘A e me’a maama;
Pea u fai ‘i he mālohi,
Hono finangalo.

Pea u fa’a vakai,
Pea fa’a lotu,
Pea ke teu’i au ‘Eiki,
Ki he fakamaau.

Pea u tui ma’u pē,
Ki he ‘Afiona,
Na’a mate ‘angaua,
Hoku laumālie.
